movie.title: The Other
movie.description_intro: In the summer of 1935, 12-year-old twins Niles and Holland Perry live with their family on a Connecticut farm. Their loving grandmother Ada has taught them something called "the game." A number of accidents begin happening, and it seems to Niles that Holland is responsible. It is Ada who begins to see the truth, and she is the only one who can stop this macabre game of murder.
movie.description_full: In the summer of 1935, 12-year-old twins Niles and Holland Perry live with their family on a Connecticut farm. Their loving grandmother Ada has taught them something called "the game." A number of accidents begin happening, and it seems to Niles that Holland is responsible. It is Ada who begins to see the truth, and she is the only one who can stop this macabre game of murder.

movies.title: Siempre, Luis
movies.summary: An immigrant from Puerto Rico is determined to bring the musical 'Hamilton' to his island home.
movies.description_full: An immigrant from Puerto Rico is determined to bring the musical 'Hamilton' to his island home.
movies.synopsis: An immigrant from Puerto Rico is determined to bring the musical 'Hamilton' to his island home.

movies.title: In the Cloud
movies.summary: The movie is about a tech company, which is developing software capable of uploading a person's consciousness and memories to a virtual space.
movies.description_full: The movie is about a tech company, which is developing software capable of uploading a person's consciousness and memories to a virtual space.
movies.synopsis: The movie is about a tech company, which is developing software capable of uploading a person's consciousness and memories to a virtual space.

movies.title: Hellboy Animated: Blood and Iron
movies.summary: When Hellboy, Liz Sherman, and Abe Sapien are assigned to investigate the ghost-infested mansion of a publicity-hound billionaire, they uncover a plot to resurrect a beautiful yet monstrous vampire from Professor Bruttenholm's past. But before they can stop her bloodbath, Hellboy will have to battle harpies, hell hounds, a giant werewolf, and even the ferocious goddess Hecate herself.
movies.description_full: When Hellboy, Liz Sherman, and Abe Sapien are assigned to investigate the ghost-infested mansion of a publicity-hound billionaire, they uncover a plot to resurrect a beautiful yet monstrous vampire from Professor Bruttenholm's past. movies.title: Crazy Romance
movies.summary: A love story between Jae Hoon, who couldn't let go of his ex-girlfriend, and Sun Young, who is splitting up with her boyfriend. The couple got trouble and were hurt by love.
